resources.string: this calculator helps estimate how much calories your body burn per day and gives calories and macros you have to eat lose weight.
the result not accurate but this is the range of your macros and calories
Intensive exercise for at least 20 minutes 1 to 3 times per week.\n a busy life style that requires you to walk frequently for long periods,this level for you
Intensive exercise for at least 30 to 60 minutes 3 to 4 times per week.
ntensive exercise for 60 minutes or greater 5 to 7 days per week\
Exceedingly active, athlete with an almost unstoppable training schedule with multiple training sessions throughout the day or a very demanding job
move the bar to choise avtivity level thats fit you
and your Calories divides to Macros below
